articles.title: Bus plunges 50ft in Raigad, 3 dead
articles.description: Three persons were killed and 32 got injured when a private bus met with an accident at Ghonse ghat in Mhasla taluka in Raigad at around 7.40am on Sunday.

articles.title: Rise in ephedrine smuggling to Oz via B'luru keeps agencies on toes
articles.description: Smuggling of ephedrine, a key chemical in manufacturing of addictive drug methamphetamine (meth), to Australia via Bengaluru's Kempegowda International Airport (KIA) has become a challenge for the Customs and directorate of revenue intelligence (DRI).

articles.title: Unable to celebrate son’s b’day, woman hangs herself
articles.description: Depressed over her inability to celebrate her son’s birthday, a 35-year-old woman has allegedly committed suicide, rendering the two-year-old and his four-year-old sister motherless.

articles.title: Karnataka sets up new committee to review govt tenders
articles.description: The state government announced the formation of a committee to scrutinise tenders of government projects and a commission to study political reservation for Other Backward Classes (OBC).

articles.title: Donors return to roots, chip in for govt schools

articles.title: Anganwadi workers say no to govt saris

articles.author: Swati Deshpande
articles.title: 30 years on, HC acquits man convicted for murder
articles.description: In a murder case that’s over three decades old, a youth, who was convicted and sentenced to life imprisonment in 1998 by a trial court in Alibaug, now stands acquitted after the Bombay high court said there is no cogent evidence to nail him.

articles.title: Blackmail by loan app agents rising in Mumbai
articles.description: Just five days since a Malad man ended his life after his morphed photographs were circulated on WhatsApp by alleged recovery agents of a loan app, another Malad resident, Anurag Singh (24), claims to have fallen prey to a similar blackmail tactic.
